column1: Smoque BBQ////Carlos met us as we entered (2) and handed a menu and explained how to order.  Made some friendly conversation and made us feel welcome.  The mouth watering smells of the place told us why they named it Smoque
column2: the flavors just hit you.  I got the brisket with bread and fries and slaw
column3: the fries were the best hot
column4: crisp and fresh.  The slaw was flavored with a type of vinegar with just the right tartness.
